content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to find learning resources for children and received a list of websites. The Scholastic website offers various resources for children, including workbooks, book reviews, superhero stories, and crafting activities. Scholastic's Little Skill Seekers Workbooks are advertised as a way to foster early literacy, numeracy, and cognitive skills through fun activities. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is also provided. When I used the "execute_shell" command again with the "df -h" command, it returned the same disk usage information as before. Additionally, I used the "google" command to find resources on how to explore and learn new things.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.scholastic.com/home/", "question": "What educational materials and activities are available for children on the Scholastic website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: promoting Scholastic's educational materials and activities for children, including literacy and math resources, book fairs and clubs, and workbooks for early literacy and numeracy. The website also features book reviews and information on new book releases, and offers resources for teachers. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is provided.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to main content (https://www.scholastic.com/home/#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.scholastic.com/en)', 'Catalogs  (javscript:void(0))', 'Catalogs (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs)', 'Education (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs/education-material)']", type='action_result')]
"""
